member.name: T:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for .

member.name: M:System.Web.Http.HttpConfigurationExtensions.InitializeReceiveSlackWebHooks(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes support for receiving Slack WebHooks. A sample WebHook URI is of the form 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/slack/{id}'. For security reasons, the WebHook URI must be an https URI and the WebHook 'token' parameter must have the same value as configured in the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_Slack' application setting. For details about Slack WebHooks, see https://api.slack.com/outgoing-webhooks.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.SlackReceiverResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.SlackReceiverResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.SlackReceiverResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.SlackReceiverResources.Receiver_BadBody
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The HTTP request body did not contain a required '{0}' property indicating a slash command or a '{1}' property indicating an outgoing WebHook..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.SlackReceiverResources.Receiver_BadToken
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The '{0}' parameter provided in the HTTP request did not match the expected value..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.SlackReceiverResources.Receiver_CommandNameInvalid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Parameter name cannot contain ';' characters: ({0})..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.SlackReceiverResources.Receiver_CommandNameQuotedString
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Parameter name cannot be a quoted string: ({0})..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.Properties.SlackReceiverResources.Receiver_CommandUnmatchedQuote
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unmatched quote ({0}) discovered at position {1}..

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.ParameterCollection
member.summary: This version of creates the output supported by

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackCommand
member.summary: The class provides mechanisms for parsing the text contained in Slack slash commands and outgoing WebHooks following a variety of different formats enabling different scenarios.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackCommand.ParseActionWithValue(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the 'text' of a slash command or 'subtext' of an outgoing WebHook of the form 'action value'.
member.example: An example of an outgoing WebHook or slash command using this format is '/assistant query what's the weather?' where '/assistant' is the trigger word or slash command, 'query' is the action and 'what's the weather?' is the value.
member.param: The 'text' of a slash command or 'subtext' of an outgoing WebHook.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackCommand.ParseActionWithParameters(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the 'text' of a slash command or 'subtext' of an outgoing WebHook of the form 'action param1; param2=value2; param3=value 3; param4="quoted value4"; ...'. Parameter values containing semi-colons can either escape the semi-colon using a backslash character, i.e '\;', or quote the value using single quotes or double quotes.
member.example: An example of an outgoing WebHook or slash command using this format is /appointment add title=doctor visit; time=Feb 3 2016 2 PM; location=Children's Hospital where '/appointment' is the trigger word or slash command, 'add' is the action and title, time, and location are parameters.
member.param: The 'text' of a slash command or 'subtext' of an outgoing WebHook.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackCommand.ValidateParameterName(System.String)
member.summary: Verify that parameter name is not a quoted string and that it doesn't contain ';'.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackCommand.EncodeNonSeparatorCharacters(System.String)
member.summary: Transform quoted or escaped ';' characters so that we can split the stream on actual parameter separators.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackField
member.summary: The class is used for expression table fields as part of a , please see https://api.slack.com/docs/attachments for details. Fields are displayed in a table inside the message attachment.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackField.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the with the given and .
member.param: The field title shown as a bold heading above the value text. It cannot contain markup and will be escaped by the receiver.
The field value which may contain Markdown-style formatting as described in https://api.slack.com/docs/formatting. The value may be multi-line and must be escaped following Markdown rules.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackField.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for serialization purposes

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackField.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the field title shown as a bold heading above the value text. It cannot contain markup and will be escaped by the receiver.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackField.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the field value. It may contain Markdown-style formatting as described in https://api.slack.com/docs/formatting. The value may be multi-line and must be escaped following Markdown rules.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackField.Short
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the field is short enough to be displayed side-by-side with other fields.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment
member.summary: The is used to describe the contents of an .

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given and .
member.param: The main text in a message attachment. The text may contain Markdown-style formatting as described in https://api.slack.com/docs/formatting. The contents will automatically be collapsed if it contains more than 700 characters or more than 5 line breaks. In this case it will be displayed with a "Show more..." link to the contents.
A plain-text summary of the attachment which will be used in clients that don't show formatted text (e.g. IRC, mobile notifications). It should not contain any markup.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for serialization purposes

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.Fallback
member.summary: Gets or sets a required plain-text summary of the attachment. This text will be used in clients that don't show formatted text (e.g. IRC, mobile notifications) and should not contain any markup.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional value that can either be one of good, warning, danger, or any hex color code (e.g. #439FE0). This value is used to color the border along the left side of the message attachment.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.Pretext
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional text that appears above the message attachment block.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.AuthorName
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional small text used to display the author's name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.AuthorLink
member.summary: Gets or sets a URI that will show up as a hyper link for the text. This will only be applied if is present.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.AuthorIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets a URI that display a small 16x16 pixel image to the left of the text. This will only be applied if is present.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional title which is displayed as larger, bold text near the top of a message attachment.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.TitleLink
member.summary: Gets or sets a hyper link for the text. This will only be applied if is present.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the main text in a message attachment. The text may contain Markdown-style formatting as described in https://api.slack.com/docs/formatting. The contents will automatically be collapsed if it contains more than 700 characters or more than 5 line breaks. In this case it will be displayed with a "Show more..." link to the contents.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.ImageLink
member.summary: Gets or a URI to an image that will be displayed inside a message attachment. Currently supported formats include GIF, JPEG, PNG, and BMP.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.ThumbLink
member.summary: Gets or a URI to an image that will be displayed as a thumbnail on the right side of a message attachment. Currently supported formats include GIF, JPEG, PNG, and BMP.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment.Fields
member.summary: Gets a set of instances that will be displayed in a table inside the message attachment

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackSlashResponse
member.summary: An can post a response to a Slack Slash request by updating the on the with a response containing a . Please see https://api.slack.com/docs/attachments#message_formatting for additional details.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given .
member.param: The Slack Slash command response text. The text may contain Markdown-style formatting as described in https://api.slack.com/docs/formatting. The contents will automatically be collapsed if it contains more than 700 characters or more than 5 line breaks. In this case it will be displayed with a "Show more..." link to the contents.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackSlashResponse.#ctor(System.String,Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackAttachment[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the given and one or more instances for additional response information. Please see for all the options available.
member.param: The Slack Slash command response text. The text may contain Markdown-style formatting as described in https://api.slack.com/docs/formatting. The contents will automatically be collapsed if it contains more than 700 characters or more than 5 line breaks. In this case it will be displayed with a "Show more..." link to the contents.
One or more instances providing additional response information. Please see for all the options available.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackSlashResponse.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor for serialization purposes

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackSlashResponse.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the Slack Slash Response text.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackSlashResponse.ResponseType
member.summary: Gets or sets the Slack Slash Response type. This value must be either in_channel or ephemeral. If in_channel then both the response message and the initial message typed by the user will be shared in the channel. If ephemeral (default) then the response message will be visible only to the user that issued the command.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackSlashResponse.Attachments
member.summary: Gets a set of instances that will comprise the Slack Slash response.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackResponse
member.summary: An can post back a response to a Slack channel by updating the on the with a response containing a .

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackResponse.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the with a given text to post to the Slack channel from which the WebHook were received.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackResponse.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text to send to Slack in response to an incoming WebHook request.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackWebHookReceiver
member.summary: Provides an implementation which supports WebHooks generated by Slack. A sample WebHook URI is of the form 'https://<host>/api/webhooks/incoming/slack/{id}'. For security reasons, the WebHook URI must be an https URI and the WebHook 'token' parameter must have the same value as configured in the 'MS_WebHookReceiverSecret_Slack' application setting. For details about Slack WebHooks, see https://api.slack.com/outgoing-webhooks.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackWebHookReceiver.ReceiverName
member.summary: Gets the receiver name for this receiver.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebHooks.SlackWebHookReceiver.GetSubtext(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The 'text' parameter provided by Slack contains both the trigger and the rest of the phrase. This isolates just the rest of the phrase making it easier to get in handlers.
member.param: The word triggering this Slack WebHook
The full text containing the trigger word.
member.returns: The subtext without the trigger word.
